Claim: :   Chick-fil-A restaurants have announced they will be reversing their longstanding policy and start opening on Sundays.
:   A Harley Davidson dealership is sponsoring a Nation of Islam rally.
:   Amazon.com employs paramedics at hot warehouses because it’s cheaper than supplying air conditioning for overheated workers.
:   A 2012 TED Talk video featuring wealthy entrepreneur Nick Hanauer speaking on the subject of income inequality was banned because it was deemed “too politically controversial.”
:   Walmart has discontinued the sale of all merchandise that is Bible-related or labeled as “made in America” to avoid offending people.
